title: Kasula Jhumkaalu with Polki Diamonds and Gem Accents
materials: Emerald. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Intricately crafted lattice Jhumka design, embellished with dazzling Polki diamonds. Features a floral stud design with a central Emerald gemstone. Delicate gold bead hangings at the bottom provide graceful movement. The Jhumka body showcases an ornate filigree pattern adorned with smaller Polki diamonds and a central Ruby, adding a pop of color.
occasions: and traditional South Indian events like Seemantham
half-saree function (Voni Function) and other special occasions. Also a perfect statement piece for any evening event.
description: These Jhumkaalu represent the pinnacle of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship, blending traditional design with modern sensibilities. The use of uncut Polki diamonds adds a unique, timeless appeal. The exquisite detailing and Hyderabadi polish ensure lasting beauty and heirloom quality. These earrings capture the essence of Telugu culture and are sure to make a statement.
